title: North India
hero_image_alt: Scenic view of the Himalayas and a temple
subtitle: Mountains & Heritage
intro: North India blends soaring Himalayan peaks, ancient spiritual centres, grand Mughal and Rajput heritage, and dramatic desert landscapes. It is the place for mountain treks, spiritual journeys, royal forts and rich cultural festivals. This page highlights top experiences, best times to visit, cities to explore and a curated set of photographs that give a quick visual glimpse of the region.

best_time.off_season: Jun–Sep (Monsoon / landslide risk in some areas)
best_time.notes: Winter is ideal for cities and desert—Himalayan treks are best in summer months.

top_experiences.title: Spiritual Journeys
top_experiences.summary: Pilgrimage and ritual experiences across holy cities.

top_cities.title: Varanasi
top_cities.summary: Ancient spiritual city on the Ganges with daily aartis and winding ghats.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Varanasi (VNS) / Rail: Varanasi Junction

top_cities.title: Agra
top_cities.summary: Home of the Taj Mahal and Mughal heritage circuits.

top_cities.title: Jaipur
top_cities.summary: Pink City — forts, bazaars and palace hotels.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Jaipur (JAI) / Rail: Jaipur Junction

top_cities.title: Leh
top_cities.summary: Gateway to Ladakh, high-altitude landscapes and Buddhist culture.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Leh (IXL) / Road via Manali-Leh or Srinagar-Leh

top_cities.title: Rishikesh
top_cities.summary: Yoga and river-rafting hub by the Ganges.
top_cities.how_to_reach_snippet: Nearest airport: Dehradun (DED) / Rail: Haridwar Junction

travel_tips: Carry layers — North India has big temperature shifts between day/night.
Book mountain permits and plan acclimatisation for high-altitude trekking.
Respect religious spaces — dress modestly at ghats & temples.
Summer is peak for Himalayan treks; winters work well for cities & deserts.

sample_itineraries.1-day: Golden triangle day: early Taj sunrise in Agra, afternoon in Jaipur’s palace complex, evening in Delhi market (requires tight transport).
sample_itineraries.3-day: Varanasi immersion: sunrise Ganges boat, old city walk, evening aarti and local food tour.

logistics.typical_internal_transport: train for city-to-city; domestic flights to mountain gateways; private car in Rajasthan
logistics.notes: Certain high-altitude areas may require permits (check local requirements).
